name: bigpipe-layout
description: Supply default layout to Bigpipe pages.

scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=test ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha $(find test -name '*.test.js') --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js || true && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Martijn Swaagman
